buckaroo.statuscode_failed: Unfortunately an error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again. If this error persists, please choose a different payment method.
buckaroo.userCanceled: According to our system, you have canceled the payment. If this is not the case, please contact us.
buckaroo.billinkRejectedMessage: Unfortunately, it is currently not possible for you to use Billink, Please select another payment method or contact Billink.
buckaroo.afterpayRejectedMessage: Unfortunately, it is currently not possible for you to use Riverty, please select another payment method or contact Riverty.

capture.general_capture_error: Unfortunately an error occurred while processing your capture. Please try again.

buckaroo.cannotRefundMissingPayment: Cannot refund order, no payment transaction is available

payperemail.payment_received: Your payment has been received and your order is being processed.
payperemail.confirmation_email: A confirmation email will be sent to you shortly with the order details.
payperemail.payment_not_completed: The payment was not completed. Your order is still pending.
payperemail.can_retry: You can complete the payment later from your account or contact us for assistance.
